definition: the act of modifying or adjusting according to due measure and proportion (as with regard to artistic effect)
details:
noun
- the act of modifying or adjusting according to due measure and proportion (as with regard to artistic effect)
- in electronics, the transmission of a signal by using it to vary a carrier wave
= example: in electronics, the transmission of a signal by using it to vary a carrier wave
- a manner of speaking in which the loudness or pitch or tone of the voice is modified
= synonyms: inflection
- rise and fall of the voice pitch
= synonyms: intonation, pitch contour
- a musical passage moving from one key to another
= synonyms: transition
